The exchange is, IMO, the best option, since the standard plan, Nc6 (hoping for developement after QxQ, NxQ) fails to Nb5.
Better is Bxe2. This move heavily delays white's developement.
Necessary to avoid Nb5. Bd7 doesn't work on account of the fact that, sooner of later, the knight will develop on c6, renewing the threat of Nb5.
A loss of time, of course. d4 is much more interesting for white.
